column2: L&T CONSTRUCTION
Power Transmission & Distribution
TLT WORKS, PITHAMPUR, PONDICHERRY & KANCHIPURAM
CNC
Description of Work
Clean the machine
Check lubrication for the following :
X Carriage, movement racks & guides
Loading bed rollers
planetary table plummer blocks, chains & planetary drive gear box
Machine bed rollers & guide roller
Marking unit slides & rollars
All punching unit slides, ball screws, tool selector, tool post and hold down
shearing unit slides and tool post
Unloading bed rollers
Check and tighten bolt, nut in all parts and foundation
Check for oil leak in hydraulic circuit and arrest it
Check for air leak in pneumatic circuit and arrest it
Check hydraulic and pneumatic hoses condition
Check hydraulic oil level in tank and oil condition
Clean hydraulic filters and air filters
Check heat exchanger function
Check function, sound and vibration of hydraulic pump
Check function and condition of all hydraulic and
pneumatic valves. Check valve base bolt tightness and
oil / air leak in valves
V : Vital  E : Essential  D : Desirable
L&T CONSTRUCTION
Power Transmission & Distribution
TLT WORKS, PITHAMPUR, PONDICHERRY & KANCHIPURAM
CNC
Description of Work
Check pincher unit condition and function
Check X servo drive gear unit condition
Check function of planetary drive and loading system
Check all heads, slides and tool selectors function
Check all hold downs function and condition
Check ball screw condition and function
Check condition of punching and shearing tool posts
Check function unoading bed rollers
Clean the console
Clean console cooler and air filter and check its function
Check all cable termination and tightness of terminal
screws
Check condition of all contactors, relays and protection
devices. Clean them
Check insertion gripness of all PCBs with mother board
Clean and check connections at machine end plugs,
console end plugs and connections
Clean and check all limit switches, proximity switches
and photo cells function and condition
V : Vital  E : Essential  D : Desirable
L&T CONSTRUCTION
Power Transmission & Distribution
TLT WORKS, PITHAMPUR, PONDICHERRY & KANCHIPURAM
CNC
Description of Work
Check all servo motors, break and couplings
Check input voltage and power supply output voltages
Check hydraulic motor and cable terminations. Lub the
bearings. Measure the insulation value and load current
Check X carriage cable drag chain condition
Check earthing
Check the function of all safety devices
Check for any abnormal sound during idle running and
if any find out the cause and rectify it
After completion of checking take a trial on machine
with prescribed sample job and offer to QC for
confirmation. If any defect is found rectify it
V : Vital  E : Essential  D : Desirable
